{{main|Where's Waldo? (TV series)}}
{{main|Where's Waldo? (TV series)}}
A 13-episode animated series, with [[Townsend Coleman]] as the voice of Waldo, was produced by [[DiC Entertainment|DiC]] and [[CBS]] in [[1991]]. The show was later translated for international markets - usually renaming the character to fit the name used in the books of that country. The dialogue and theme song were recorded in alternate âWallyâ version, with the same voice cast of the original US production, in order to later market the show to the UK market. The distribution rights to "Where's Waldo", and its international dubs, are currently held by [[HIT Entertainment]]
